name: h2o_predictor
label: H2O MOJO Predictor
description: Given an H2O_3 model, perform predictions by reading data from a csv file and saving predictions to file

inputInfo.label: samples-file
inputInfo.description: Samples Input file, csv format. First line should contain features names

arguments.label: Model input file
arguments.description: File to use for loading the model

arguments.label: Prediction samples file
arguments.description: Samples Input file, csv format. First line should contain features names

arguments.label: Predictions output file
arguments.description: File to save predictions in, if a directory is provided then the file is created inside

arguments.label: Convert Unknown Categorical Levels To Na
arguments.description: Convert Unknown Categorical Levels To Na
